name: witch2.rpg
description:
Once again, it is halloween, and a certain vampire has some things to get done.

Go around a strange castle as you collect [and, of course, wear] various costumes and accessories.

_________

I made this in 2016, and unlike witch.rpg the original still feel confident enough in it that I don't feel the need to do any updates to it.

Music, as always, is stolen from a few sources.
